Name: Detective Solitaire The Ghost Agency 2
About the game: Help a Ghost Agency detective investigate a new case! The detective needs your help more than ever! Explore many new locations, find hidden clues. Become a junior detective and get ready for new complicated cases. There will be a lot of complicated card puzzles coming your way! They will try to confuse you, but you can handle them! Do you like solitaire games? Do you like to solve mysterious riddles, examine clues and catch dangerous criminals, or maybe you have always dreamed of joining the Ghost Agency? Then this game will not leave you indifferent! - The Ghost Agency needs your help! - Solitaire card game â€“ collect chains of cards! - Never a dull moment with super exciting levels! - Vivid graphics and a Pirate soundtrack make this Solitaire a win-win! - Get rid of cards faster with jokers, and increase the combo multiplier to earn more coins! - Earn achievements and get all 15 clues and leads! - Enjoy a magical mystery atmosphere! - Let the fun take over!
